original: zhes pa ni /

analyzed: cis khyad 'phags she na /

analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i ye shes bde ba de nyid thob pa de'i rang bzhin nyid yin par dgongs so //

analyzed: g-yon pa dmar ni a'a li'i rang bzhin shes rab kyi ngo bo gsung zhes bya'o //

analyzed: spyi bo'i zhal zhes pa ni steng gi rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'o //

analyzed: lhag ma'i zhal gzhan bzhi ni nag po nyid yin no //

original: 'dis ni 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /

original: 'dis ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po bdag med ma'i char gyur pa'i dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin cha med pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa dang dbyer med pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po bdag med ma'i char gyur pa'i dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin cha med pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa dang dbyer med pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: This is the nature of the four dakinis of the nature of earth, water, fire, and wind, which are the parts of Nairatmya, the nature of the four joys, the partless nature, the nature of the conventional truth, which is inseparable from nirvana.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bskul bas ye shes gsum gyi bdag nyid gnyis ka dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gang de nyid chos kyi sku'o //

translated: Or, you of compassionate mind indicates the nature of the vajra of body, which has the characteristic of universal illumination, and is endowed with the emanation body.

analyzed: @208a * // bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //

analyzed: mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig / ces pa 'dis ni kun du snang ba mngon par brjod pa'i yang dag pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang chos kyi sku dang dbyer med pa'i sku yin par

translated: The four dakinis, white and so on, are also limbs of Vajradhara, and they are similar to the nature of Hevajra, who is pleased by those four joys. Therefore, it is not reasonable to teach that they enter into union by being urged by him.

translated: By that, the vajra-wisdom is in the bhaga.

original: gzhib par bya ni ye shes kyi mngon par zhen pa bcom pa'o //
analyzed: gzhib par bya ni ye shes kyi mngon par zhen pa bcom pa'o //
translated: One should roll about means the destruction of the clinging of wisdom.

original: gar bya glu yang blang bar bya ni glu dang gar gyi don dag bstan zin pa nyid do //
analyzed: gar bya glu yang blang bar bya ni glu dang gar gyi don dag bstan zin pa nyid do //
translated: One should dance and sing as well means the meaning of song and dance has already been explained.

original: bo la kakko la sbyar nas //
analyzed: bo la kakko la sbyar nas //
translated: Having united the bhaga and the kakkola,

original: de la rtsed mo rtse bar bya //
analyzed: de la rtsed mo rtse bar bya //
translated: one should play there.

original: kha sbyor gyi sbyor ba nyid kyis thams cad bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: kha sbyor gyi sbyor ba nyid kyis thams cad bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that everything should be generated by the yoga of union.

original: de nas thun tshod gnyis pa la //
analyzed: de nas thun tshod gnyis pa la //
translated: Then, in the second period,

original: gos kyis mig ni bkab nas su //
analyzed: gos kyis mig ni bkab nas su //
translated: having covered the eyes with cloth,

original: der ni slob ma gzhug pa gnyis //
analyzed: der ni slob ma gzhug pa gnyis //
translated: one should lead the two disciples there.

original: phyi nas dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan //
analyzed: phyi nas dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan //
translated: Afterwards, one should show the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: gos kyis zhes pa ni ras ser pos so //
analyzed: gos kyis zhes pa ni ras ser pos so //
translated: Cloth means yellow cloth.

original: mtshon mo skye bo med khyim du //
analyzed: mtshon mo skye bo med khyim du //
translated: In the night, in a house without people,

original: slob dpon la sogs rab phye nas //
analyzed: slob dpon la sogs rab phye nas //
translated: having opened the ma·πá·∏çala,

original: dbang ni ji ltar gsungs pa nyid //
analyzed: dbang ni ji ltar gsungs pa nyid //
translated: the empowerment should be given just as it is taught.

original: de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya //
analyzed: de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya //
translated: There, one should give the empowerment.

original: slob ma'i sgras ni dbang po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: slob ma'i sgras ni dbang po la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúdisciple‚Äù refers to Indra and so on.

original: de ni gzhug par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni gzhug par bya ba'o //
translated: That is the introduction.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan ni 'dus pa'i ye shes gsal bar bstan to //
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan ni 'dus pa'i ye shes gsal bar bstan to //
translated: Then, having shown the ma·πá·∏çala, the gnosis of the assembly is clearly shown.

original: de nyid dbang dri ma med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de nyid dbang dri ma med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: That itself is the empowerment, the stainless gnosis.

original: de nyid kyi phyir skye bo med khyim du ni //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir skye bo med khyim du ni //
translated: Therefore, in a house without people,

original: dben pa'i lus kyi mngon par zhen pas so //
analyzed: dben pa'i lus kyi mngon par zhen pas so //
translated: the body is isolated from manifest clinging.

original: ji ltar mchod dang bstod bshad pa //
analyzed: ji ltar mchod dang bstod bshad pa //
translated: The worship and praise have been explained.

original: slob ma bzang pos sngar shes bya //
analyzed: slob ma bzang pos sngar shes bya //
translated: The good disciple should know them beforehand.

original: de nyid de la bstan par bya //
analyzed: de nyid de la bstan par bya //
translated: That itself should be shown to him.

original: rnam dga' dang po mchog mtha' can //
analyzed: rnam dga' dang po mchog mtha' can //
translated: The first supreme limit of joy

original: rgyud rnams kun du sbas pa ste //
analyzed: rgyud rnams kun du sbas pa ste //
translated: is hidden in all the tantras.

original: mtha' yi mtha' mar rab tu bstan //
analyzed: mtha' yi mtha' mar rab tu bstan //
translated: It is taught at the end of the end.

original: 'di rnam par dga' ba yang yin la dang po yang yin pas rnam par dga' ba dang po'o //
analyzed: 'di rnam par dga' ba yang yin la dang po yang yin pas rnam par dga' ba dang po'o //
translated: Since it is both a joy and first, it is the first joy.

original: 'di mchog kyang yin la mtha' ma yang yin pas mchog mtha' can no //
analyzed: 'di mchog kyang yin la mtha' ma yang yin pas mchog mtha' can no //
translated: Since it is both supreme and the end, it has the supreme end.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i rnam dga' dang po mchog mtha' can no //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i rnam dga' dang po mchog mtha' can no //
translated: Such is the first supreme limit of joy.

original: yang na gang la rnam par dga' ba dang por yod pa de ni rnam dga' dang po'o //
analyzed: yang na gang la rnam par dga' ba dang por yod pa de ni rnam dga' dang po'o //
translated: Or else, that which is the first to have delight is the first delight.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i mchog ni khyad 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i mchog ni khyad 'phags pa'o //
translated: Such a supreme one is the special one.

original: mtha' ni mtha' ste srid pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: mtha' ni mtha' ste srid pa'i mtha'o //
translated: The end is the end, the end of existence.

original: 'di lta bu can ni ye shes so //üîΩyang na rnam dga' yang 'di yin la dang po mchog kyang yin pas rnam dga' dang @214a * //
analyzed: 'di lta bu can ni ye shes so // yang na rnam dga' yang 'di yin la dang po mchog kyang yin pas rnam dga' dang @214a * //
translated: Such a one is the knowledge.

original: po mchog go //
analyzed: po mchog go //
translated: Or else, it is the first delight and it is supreme, thus it is the first supreme delight.

original: de mthar byed pas rnam dga' dang po mchog mtha' can no //
analyzed: de mthar byed pas rnam dga' dang po mchog mtha' can no //
translated: It is the end of that, thus it has the first supreme delight as its end.

original: rgyud rnams kun du sbas pa ste //
analyzed: rgyud rnams kun du sbas pa ste //
translated: It is hidden in all the tantras.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is what is said.

original: rgod pa la sogs pa rnams su'o //
analyzed: rgod pa la sogs pa rnams su'o //
translated: In the various explanations, etc.

original: yang na bye brag tu bshad pa kun du sbas pa'o /
analyzed: yang na bye brag tu bshad pa kun du sbas pa'o /
translated: Or else, it is hidden in the various explanations.

original: de cis khyad 'phags she na /
analyzed: de cis khyad 'phags she na /
translated: How is it special?

original: mtha' ste de las gzhan ci yang med pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' ste de las gzhan ci yang med pa'o //
translated: It is the end, there is nothing else beyond it.

original: de nyid mtha' mur thug pa ste yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin du yin pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid mtha' mur thug pa ste yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin du yin pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is the end of the end, the end of the real, it is just as it is.

original: de rab tu bstan ni 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de rab tu bstan ni 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: It is taught as the nature of clear light.

original: rdo rje mchod pa rab sbyar nas //
analyzed: rdo rje mchod pa rab sbyar nas //
translated: Having applied the vajra worship,

original: de la lha mo des zhus pa //
analyzed: de la lha mo des zhus pa //
translated: the goddess asked him,

original: lha de'i skad cig ci zhig lags //
analyzed: lha de'i skad cig ci zhig lags //
translated: ‚ÄúWhat is the moment of the deity?

original: gtso bo chen pos bshad du gsol //
analyzed: gtso bo chen pos bshad du gsol //
translated: Please explain, Great Lord.‚Äù

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: der ni thog ma dbus mtha' med //
analyzed: der ni thog ma dbus mtha' med //
translated: ‚ÄúThere, there is no beginning, middle, or end,

original: srid med mya ngan 'das pa med //
analyzed: srid med mya ngan 'das pa med //
translated: no existence, no nirvana.

original: 'di ni mchog tu bde chen yin //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog tu bde chen yin //
translated: This is the supreme great bliss,

original: bdag med gzhan yang med pa nyid //
analyzed: bdag med gzhan yang med pa nyid //
translated: without self and also without other.

original: thog ma med ni dang po skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma med ni dang po skye ba med pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout beginning‚Äù means without initial arising.

original: de med pa'i phyir mtha' ma 'jig pa yang med do //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir mtha' ma 'jig pa yang med do //
translated: Because of that, there is no end, no destruction.

original: skye ba dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dbus ma dbus su gnas pa yang med pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dbus ma dbus su gnas pa yang med pa'o //
translated: Because there is no arising or destruction, there is also no middle, no abiding in the middle.

original: de ni skad cig re re'o //
analyzed: de ni skad cig re re'o //
translated: That is the moment, each moment.

original: de nyid gsal bar byas pa srid med 'khor med pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar byas pa srid med 'khor med pa'o //
translated: That is clarified as ‚Äúno existence, no samsara.‚Äù

original: gdol nas ma skyes pa'i phyir kun rdzob yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gdol nas ma skyes pa'i phyir kun rdzob yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not born from the elements, it does not exist conventionally.

original: de med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa med pa ste /
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa med pa ste /
translated: Because of that, there is no nirvana.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'jig pa gzod ma nas ma skyes pa med pa yin pa'i phyir yin par dgongs so //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'jig pa gzod ma nas ma skyes pa med pa yin pa'i phyir yin par dgongs so //
translated: Nirvana is the non-destruction of the beginningless non-production.

original: yang na / srid dang mya ngan 'das med ces pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang don dam pa'i bden pa ste bden pa gnyis med pa'o //
analyzed: yang na / srid dang mya ngan 'das med ces pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang don dam pa'i bden pa ste bden pa gnyis med pa'o //
translated: Again, existence and non-existence of nirvana means the non-existence of the two truths, the conventional truth and the ultimate truth.

original: de skad du 'phags pa'i zhal snga nas //üîΩgang zhig dngos nyid ma skyes pa //
analyzed: de skad du 'phags pa'i zhal snga nas // gang zhig dngos nyid ma skyes pa //
translated: Thus it is said by the Noble One:üîΩHow can that which is not produced by itself

original: ji ltar gzhan gyis skyes pa yin //
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan gyis skyes pa yin //
translated: be produced by another?

original: mo gsham gyi ni bu yang ni //
analyzed: mo gsham gyi ni bu yang ni //
translated: Is the son of a barren woman

original: de ni skye bar 'gyur ram ci //
analyzed: de ni skye bar 'gyur ram ci //
translated: produced or not?

original: zhes pa'o // 'di ni mchog tu bde chen yin //üîΩzhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // 'di ni mchog tu bde chen yin // zhes pa ni /
translated: This is the supreme great bliss.

original: 'di nyid mchog tu bde ba chen po phul du byung ba med pa'i bde ba yang dag pa'i ye shes bde bar nyams su myong ba yang gang du yod pa ma yin te nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yongs su spangs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid mchog tu bde ba chen po phul du byung ba med pa'i bde ba yang dag pa'i ye shes bde bar nyams su myong ba yang gang du yod pa ma yin te nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yongs su spangs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the supreme great bliss, the bliss which is not surpassed, the experience of the bliss of the authentic intuition, which does not exist anywhere, because it is by nature the complete abandonment of the instincts of the addictions.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this very reason,

original: bdag med gzhan yod ma yin ni bdag dang gzhan rtog pa yang de la yod pa @214b ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag med gzhan yod ma yin ni bdag dang gzhan rtog pa yang de la yod pa @214b ma yin te /
translated: The line there is no self and no other means that the concepts of self and other do not exist there.

original: dbyer med rang bzhin yin par dgongs so //
analyzed: dbyer med rang bzhin yin par dgongs so //
translated: The thought is that they are inseparable and natural.

original: 'di nyid kyi skad cig ji ltar rtogs pa yin par gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi skad cig ji ltar rtogs pa yin par gsungs pa /
translated: The way to realize this very moment is taught:

original: longs spyod kyi ni rlabs gnyis la //üîΩrang gi g-yas dang lag gzhan gyi //
analyzed: longs spyod kyi ni rlabs gnyis la // rang gi g-yas dang lag gzhan gyi //
translated: The two waves of enjoymentüîΩare one's right and other hands.

original: mthe bo dang ni srin lag gang //
analyzed: mthe bo dang ni srin lag gang //
translated: The thumb and ring finger

original: de ni rnal 'byor pa yis btsir //üîΩzhes pa ni /üîΩg-yas dang g-yon no //üîΩg-yon ni rang gi g-yas dang cig shos ni rang gi g-yas dang gzhan te /
analyzed: de ni rnal 'byor pa yis btsir // zhes pa ni / g-yas dang g-yon no // g-yon ni rang gi g-yas dang cig shos ni rang gi g-yas dang gzhan te /
translated: are pressed by the yogin.üîΩThe right and leftüîΩare the right and other hands.

original: rang gi g-yas dang g-yon yang yin la lag pa yin pas rang gi g-yas dang lag gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: rang gi g-yas dang g-yon yang yin la lag pa yin pas rang gi g-yas dang lag gzhan gyi'o //
translated: The right and left are also the hands, so they are one's right and other hands.

original: de'i mthe bo dang ni srin lag gis ni de dag gis so //
analyzed: de'i mthe bo dang ni srin lag gis ni de dag gis so //
translated: The thumb and ring finger are those two.

original: long spyod ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: long spyod ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo ste /
translated: The enjoyment is the enjoyment chakra.

original: rlabs gnyis btsir bar bya'o //
analyzed: rlabs gnyis btsir bar bya'o //
translated: The two waves are pressed.

original: rnal 'byor pa yis zhes pa ni rnal 'byor shes pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis zhes pa ni rnal 'byor shes pa ste /
translated: The yogin is one who knows yoga.

original: 'dir bla ma'i gdams ngag yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir bla ma'i gdams ngag yod pa yin no //
translated: Here, the guru's instruction is present.

original: yang na rang ni sems te g-yas ni g-yon gyi zla ba yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: yang na rang ni sems te g-yas ni g-yon gyi zla ba yin pa'i don to //
translated: Or else, one's own is the mind, and the right is the moon of the left.

original: gzhan ni nyi ma'o /
analyzed: gzhan ni nyi ma'o /
translated: The other is the sun.

original: 'dis ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang sa bon gcig pa nyid kyis bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang sa bon gcig pa nyid kyis bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because of the unity of the moon, sun, and seed, which is the gnosis of successful activities.

original: lag ces pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi ye shes dang lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes lnga rnams so //
analyzed: lag ces pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi ye shes dang lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes lnga rnams so //
translated: The hand is the five gnoses of the extremely pure gnosis of phenomena and the connate gnosis.

original: de ni ye shes lnga gcig pa'i rang bzhin yin pas mtho bo snying rje'i rang bzhin thabs kyi ye shes kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: de ni ye shes lnga gcig pa'i rang bzhin yin pas mtho bo snying rje'i rang bzhin thabs kyi ye shes kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: That is the nature of the unity of the five gnoses. The high is the relative truth, the gnosis of method, the nature of compassion.

original: srin lag gang zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin shes rab kyi ye shes don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: srin lag gang zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin shes rab kyi ye shes don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: The ring finger is the ultimate truth, the gnosis of wisdom, the nature of emptiness.

original: de dag gis rlabs gnyis ni shugs gnyis kyis gzung ba la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pa'o /
analyzed: de dag gis rlabs gnyis ni shugs gnyis kyis gzung ba la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pa'o /
translated: The two waves are the two forces of clinging to subject and object.

original: de btsir bar bya ba ni gcig tu bya ba'o //
analyzed: de btsir bar bya ba ni gcig tu bya ba'o //
translated: They should be squeezed together, meaning they should be unified.

original: rnal 'byor pa zhes pa ni zung 'jug shes pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes pa ni zung 'jug shes pa'o //
translated: The yogi is the one who knows the union.

original: zung 'jug shes pa'i skad cig nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: zung 'jug shes pa'i skad cig nyid gsungs pa /
translated: The moment of knowing the union is stated:

original: longs spyod kyi ste /
analyzed: longs spyod kyi ste /
translated: in the enjoyment,

original: yang dag par longs spyod pa ni longs spyod de lhan cig skyes pa'i skad cig yin pa'i don te dus der yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: yang dag par longs spyod pa ni longs spyod de lhan cig skyes pa'i skad cig yin pa'i don te dus der yin pa'i don to //
translated: the enjoyment is the moment of the innate, the meaning of which is the meaning of that time.

original: 'dis ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa de'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa de'o //
translated: This is the inseparability of emptiness and compassion.

original: gang byang chub kyi sems de nyid ye shes lnga dang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid yin par bstan zin pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang byang chub kyi sems de nyid ye shes lnga dang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid yin par bstan zin pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement that the very mind of enlightenment is the nature of the five intuitions and the three bodies is finished.üîΩOr else,

original: yang na / rang gi g-yas dang lag gzhan gyi //üîΩzhes pa ni /
analyzed: yang na / rang gi g-yas dang lag gzhan gyi // zhes pa ni /
translated: with one‚Äôs left and rightüîΩhands,

original: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i lag pa mthe bo dang srin lag gang de dag gis so //üîΩlongs spyod du ni rdo rje nor bu'i nang du son pa'i byang @215a * //
analyzed: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i lag pa mthe bo dang srin lag gang de dag gis so // longs spyod du ni rdo rje nor bu'i nang du son pa'i byang @215a * //
translated: the left and right hands are the thumbs and the ring fingers.

original: chub kyi sems kyi skad cig la'o //
analyzed: chub kyi sems kyi skad cig la'o //
translated: In the enjoyment, in the moment of the mind of enlightenment that has entered the vajra jewel,

original: rlabs gnyis ni rnal 'byor pas lte 'og btsir bar bya'o //
analyzed: rlabs gnyis ni rnal 'byor pas lte 'og btsir bar bya'o //
translated: the two waves are to be squeezed below the navel by the yogi.

original: de nas brtan par gyur nas lhan cig skyes pa 'char ba gsal bar 'gyur ba yin par dgongs so //
analyzed: de nas brtan par gyur nas lhan cig skyes pa 'char ba gsal bar 'gyur ba yin par dgongs so //
translated: Then, when it is stable, the arising of the connate [joy] will be clear.

original: de byas pa cir 'gyur ba yin par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de byas pa cir 'gyur ba yin par gsungs pa /
translated: It is said what will happen when that is done:

original: de nas ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de nas ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
translated: Then wisdom will arise.

original: gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the joy of a youth.

original: phyi nas ni rjes thogs su'o //
analyzed: phyi nas ni rjes thogs su'o //
translated: After that,üîΩit will arise,

original: skye bar 'gyur ni rab tu gsal bar rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: skye bar 'gyur ni rab tu gsal bar rtogs pa'o //
translated: it will be clearly realized.

original: ye shes ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: ye shes ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Wisdom is the connate wisdom.

original: dpe gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpe gsungs pa /
translated: The example is stated:

original: gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the joy of a youth.

original: sngar nyams su ma myong ba'i don spyod yul ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: sngar nyams su ma myong ba'i don spyod yul ma yin pa'o //
translated: The meaning that has not been experienced before is not the domain.

original: dga' ba ni mdzes par dga' bas phul du byung ba'i bde ba gzhan med pa'i gzhon nu ma des de nyams su myong ba lta bur ye shes de yin pas gzhon nu dga' ba nyid ji lta ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni mdzes par dga' bas phul du byung ba'i bde ba gzhan med pa'i gzhon nu ma des de nyams su myong ba lta bur ye shes de yin pas gzhon nu dga' ba nyid ji lta ba'o //
translated: Joy is the supreme bliss of beautiful delight. It is like that youth who experiences that. Since that is wisdom, it is like the joy of a youth.

original: dpe'i dpe gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpe'i dpe gsungs pa /
translated: The example of the example is stated:

original: gzhon nu ma'i bde ba de yang de la ci zhig skye zhe na /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma'i bde ba de yang de la ci zhig skye zhe na /
translated: What arises from that youth's bliss?

original: lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta bu'o //
analyzed: lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta bu'o //
translated: Like the dream of a mute.

original: de la zhes pa ni gzhon nu de la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes pa ni gzhon nu de la'o //
translated: In that, in the youth.

original: ci zhig ces pa ni ma ning ste /
analyzed: ci zhig ces pa ni ma ning ste /
translated: What? The neuter.

original: 'di de zhes yongs su bcad par mi nus so //
analyzed: 'di de zhes yongs su bcad par mi nus so //
translated: This is not able to be ascertained.

original: gang de skye ba ni gsal po nyid du rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang de skye ba ni gsal po nyid du rtogs pa'o //
translated: That which is born is understood clearly.

original: de yang lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta bu'o //
analyzed: de yang lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta bu'o //
translated: And that is like the dream of a mute.

original: ji ltar mngon par mi shes pa'i rmi lam brjod par mi nus pa ltar de yang brjod par mi nus shing /
analyzed: ji ltar mngon par mi shes pa'i rmi lam brjod par mi nus pa ltar de yang brjod par mi nus shing /
translated: Just as a dream that is not understood cannot be described, so that also cannot be described.

original: bdag nyid gcig pus shes pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid gcig pus shes pa'o //
translated: It is known by oneself alone.

original: 'di nyid kyis ni gang la dpe nyid tshig gis brjod par mi nus pa de la don gyi chos ni brjod pas chog go //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis ni gang la dpe nyid tshig gis brjod par mi nus pa de la don gyi chos ni brjod pas chog go //
translated: By this very [verse], in regard to that which is not able to be described by words, even the example itself, the meaning of the Dharma is sufficient.

original: rang rig pa'i rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes yin no //
analyzed: rang rig pa'i rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes yin no //
translated: It is the indivisible three vajras of self-awareness, the co-emergent wisdom.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyid gsungs pa /
translated: The nature of the co-emergent is taught:

original: mchog mtha' rnam dag dbus su ni //
analyzed: mchog mtha' rnam dag dbus su ni //
translated: In the middle of the pure supreme limit,

original: stong dang mi stong he ru ka //
analyzed: stong dang mi stong he ru ka //
translated: The Heruka of emptiness and non-emptiness.

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: In that,

original: mchog ni khyad 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni khyad 'phags pa'o //
translated: Supreme means exalted.

original: mtha' ni mtha'i srid pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' ni mtha'i srid pa'o //
translated: The end is the end of existence.

original: gang gi mtha' zhe na rnam dag dbus kyi'o //
analyzed: gang gi mtha' zhe na rnam dag dbus kyi'o //
translated: Whose end? Of the pure middle.üîΩThe pure middle is the abode of the pure joy, which is free from the method of continuity.

original: rnam dag dbus zhes pa ni rnam par dga' ba'i yang mthar chags pa dang bral ba'i tshul gyis gnas par de'i mtha' nyid yin par brgya la the tshom zab bsal bar bya ba'i phyir /üîΩrnam dga' dbus zhes pa ste 'di dbus kyang yin la rnam pa dga' ba yang yin pas rnam dga' dbus te /
analyzed: rnam dag dbus zhes pa ni rnam par dga' ba'i yang mthar chags pa dang bral ba'i tshul gyis gnas par de'i mtha' nyid yin par brgya la the tshom zab bsal bar bya ba'i phyir / rnam dga' dbus zhes pa ste 'di dbus kyang yin la rnam pa dga' ba yang yin pas rnam dga' dbus te /
translated: In order to remove the doubt as to whether that is its end,üîΩit is said to be the pure middle.üîΩIt is the middle because it is the middle of the joys, the joy, supreme joy, and natural joy, and it is pure because it is free from the stains of the three joys.

original: @215b dga' ba dang mchog dga' dag dang lhan cig skyes pa dang rnam par dga' ba de dag gi dbus ni rnam par dga' ba ste de'i mtha'o //
analyzed: @215b dga' ba dang mchog dga' dag dang lhan cig skyes pa dang rnam par dga' ba de dag gi dbus ni rnam par dga' ba ste de'i mtha'o //
translated: The end of that is the end of the pure joy.

original: de cis khyad par 'phags pa yin pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de cis khyad par 'phags pa yin pa gsungs pa /
translated: By what is it distinguished?

original: stong dang stong nyid de stong dang ni rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: stong dang stong nyid de stong dang ni rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is said to be empty and empty of emptiness, and free from nature.

original: de nyid stong pa ste rang bzhin rnal ma yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid stong pa ste rang bzhin rnal ma yin pa'i don to //
translated: That itself is empty, which is the meaning of the natural state.

original: de ci zhe na he ru ka ste /
analyzed: de ci zhe na he ru ka ste /
translated: What is that? It is Heruka.

original: he zhes pa ni rgyu la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: he zhes pa ni rgyu la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: He is free from cause and so forth.

original: ru zhes pa ni yi ge ru tshogs dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: ru zhes pa ni yi ge ru tshogs dang bral ba'o //
translated: Ru is free from the collection of syllables.

original: ka zhes bya ba ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ka zhes bya ba ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o //
translated: Ka is not located anywhere.

original: de ltar rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi rang bzhin ma ning yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi rang bzhin ma ning yin no //
translated: Thus, the three vajras are indivisible, and the nature of the three doors of liberation is the neutral state.

original: gang yang rnam par dga' ba'i sgra ni dga' ba zhugs pa de bzhin du yang thams cad nyid la chags pa dang bral bar nyams su myong ba the tshom za bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang yang rnam par dga' ba'i sgra ni dga' ba zhugs pa de bzhin du yang thams cad nyid la chags pa dang bral bar nyams su myong ba the tshom za bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Also, the term joy is the entry of joy, and in the same way, there is doubt in the experience of being free from attachment to everything.

original: gzhan du na skad cig ma bzhi khyad par med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan du na skad cig ma bzhi khyad par med par 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, the four moments would be indistinguishable.

original: dga' ba gcig nyid kyi rang bzhin phra ba yin par dgongs so //
analyzed: dga' ba gcig nyid kyi rang bzhin phra ba yin par dgongs so //
translated: The nature of a single joy is subtle.

original: yang na mchog mtha' zhes pa ni de mchog kyang yin la mtha' yang yin pas mchog mtha' ste gang gi mtha' zhe na /
analyzed: yang na mchog mtha' zhes pa ni de mchog kyang yin la mtha' yang yin pas mchog mtha' ste gang gi mtha' zhe na /
translated: Alternatively, supreme limit is the supreme limit because it is supreme and it is a limit. What is the limit of that?

original: rnam dga' dbus su ste dbus ni mchog dga'o //
analyzed: rnam dga' dbus su ste dbus ni mchog dga'o //
translated: The limit of joy is the middle, and the middle is supreme joy.

original: rnam dga' ni mtha' yin pas mtha' dang dbus dag la dang po ltos pa yin pas dga' ba yang de yod pa ste /
analyzed: rnam dga' ni mtha' yin pas mtha' dang dbus dag la dang po ltos pa yin pas dga' ba yang de yod pa ste /
translated: Since the end is the limit, the limit and the middle depend on the first, and so there is joy.

original: dga' ba gsum po gang de nyid mchog mtha' lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba gsum po gang de nyid mchog mtha' lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: That very third joy is the supreme end, the innate.

original: de yang sku gsung thugs rnams kyi longs spyod ma yin pa'i phyir gtan la dbab par mi nus te /
analyzed: de yang sku gsung thugs rnams kyi longs spyod ma yin pa'i phyir gtan la dbab par mi nus te /
translated: Moreover, since it is not the enjoyment of the body, speech, and mind, it cannot be ascertained.

original: gzhon nu ma'i dga' ba la sogs pa'i dpes khyad par cung zad byin gyis brlabs nas bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma'i dga' ba la sogs pa'i dpes khyad par cung zad byin gyis brlabs nas bstan pa yin no //
translated: It is taught by the example of the joy of a young woman, and so forth, after a slight blessing.

original: stong dang stong min he ru ka / zhes pa ni /
analyzed: stong dang stong min he ru ka / zhes pa ni /
translated: The empty and non-empty Heruka

original: rten yin pa nyid kyi don to //
analyzed: rten yin pa nyid kyi don to //
translated: means that it is the object of the support.

original: 'di ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste lnga pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste lnga pa'o //
translated: This is the fifth chapter of the Tantra called ‚ÄúThe Origin of Heruka.‚Äù

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The so-called Heruka is the gnosis of the inseparability of method and wisdom.

original: de'i mngon par 'byung ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du yongs su bskyed pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i go 'phang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po //
analyzed: de'i mngon par 'byung ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du yongs su bskyed pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i go 'phang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po //
translated: His emergence is the perfect enlightenment in the nature of emptiness endowed with all supreme aspects, the stage of Hevajra.

original: de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba ni brnga'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba ni brnga'o //
translated: Such is the praise.

original: rim phye ba lnga pa ni lnga po rnams rdzogs pa'o /
analyzed: rim phye ba lnga pa ni lnga po rnams rdzogs pa'o /
translated: The fivefold sequence is the completion of the five.

original: // / @216a * //  rab tu gsal ba'i kha sbyor gyi rgya cher 'grel pa las he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u lnga pa'o /
analyzed: // / @216a * //  rab tu gsal ba'i kha sbyor gyi rgya cher 'grel pa las he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u lnga pa'o /
translated: This concludes the fifth chapter, the Heruka chapter, in the commentary on the tantra, the Shining Lamp.

original: // / dgyes pa'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba'i ye shes lnga dang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes lnga phyag rgya lnga'i rang bzhin nyid du bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa ;
analyzed: // / dgyes pa'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba'i ye shes lnga dang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes lnga phyag rgya lnga'i rang bzhin nyid du bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa ;
translated: In order to teach the nature of the five gnoses, which are the nature of the three bodies, and the five gnoses, which are the nature of the five seals, of the emergence of Hevajra, it is said:

original: / lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing //üîΩbo la thod par bcug nas ni //
analyzed: / lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing // bo la thod par bcug nas ni //
translated: Embracing the goddess,üîΩplacing the skull in the lap,

original: dam du nu ma bzung mdzad nas //
analyzed: dam du nu ma bzung mdzad nas //
translated: firmly holding the breasts,

original: skyes pa'i sna ni gzhibs nas kyang //üîΩtshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni //
analyzed: skyes pa'i sna ni gzhibs nas kyang // tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni //
translated: And having embraced the nose of the man,üîΩAnd having bitten the lower lip with his teeth,

original: mchan khung sen mos rma mdzad de //
analyzed: mchan khung sen mos rma mdzad de //
translated: And having made a wound in the armpit with his fingernails,

original: mnyam sbyar bde ba myang mdzad nas //
analyzed: mnyam sbyar bde ba myang mdzad nas //
translated: Having tasted the bliss of union,

original: phyag rgya lnga ni rab phye ba ;
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga ni rab phye ba ;
translated: The five symbolic ornaments are fully opened,

original: / don ni gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: / don ni gsal ba nyid do //
translated: The meaning is clear.

original: yang na / lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing //
analyzed: yang na / lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing //
translated: Or, having embraced the goddess,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is

original: dga' ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: dga' ba'i ye shes so //
translated: The wisdom of joy.üîΩHaving entered the skull-cavity,

original: bo la thod par bug nas ni mchog dga'i ye shes so //
analyzed: bo la thod par bug nas ni mchog dga'i ye shes so //
translated: The wisdom of supreme joy.

original: dam du nu ma bzung mdzad nas //
analyzed: dam du nu ma bzung mdzad nas //
translated: Having tightly grasped the breasts,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is

original: rnam par dga' ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rnam par dga' ba'i ye shes so //
translated: The wisdom of special joy.

original: skyes pa'i sna ni gzhibs nas kyang ;
analyzed: skyes pa'i sna ni gzhibs nas kyang ;
translated: And having embraced the nose of the man,

original: / zhes pa ni /
analyzed: / zhes pa ni /
translated: This is

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The wisdom of innate joy.

original: de lta bur yod pa'i mnyam sbyar bde ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de lta bur yod pa'i mnyam sbyar bde ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The bliss of union that exists in that way is the wisdom of nonduality.

original: myang mdzad nas /
analyzed: myang mdzad nas /
translated: Having tasted,

original: mchan khung sen mos rma mdzad de //
analyzed: mchan khung sen mos rma mdzad de //
translated: Having made a wound in the armpit with his fingernails,

original: phyag rgya lnga ni rab phye ba //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga ni rab phye ba //
translated: The five symbolic ornaments are fully opened,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is

original: mchan khung sen mos btab pa ste sngar rjes su chags pa dang / de'i rjes su dam du 'khyud pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mchan khung sen mos btab pa ste sngar rjes su chags pa dang / de'i rjes su dam du 'khyud pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: and the earrings.

original: phyag rgya lnga nyid gsungs pa //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga nyid gsungs pa //
translated: The five symbolic ornaments are taught:

original: bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la //üîΩphyag 'tshal don du 'khor lo 'dzin //
analyzed: bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la // phyag 'tshal don du 'khor lo 'dzin //
translated: For the guru, the master, and the god of desire,üîΩone holds a wheel for the purpose of homage.

original: spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'chang ba nyid /
analyzed: spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'chang ba nyid /
translated: One holds a wheel on the crown,

original: rgyun mi 'chad par bla ma la sogs pa la 'dud pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyun mi 'chad par bla ma la sogs pa la 'dud pa yin te /
translated: and one bows to the guru and so on without break.

original: 'khor lo'i phyag rgya rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa yin par dgongs so //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i phyag rgya rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa yin par dgongs so //
translated: The wheel mudra is considered to be Ak·π£obhya.

original: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la smod tshig mi nyan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la smod tshig mi nyan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order not to listen to disparaging words about the guru vajra holder,

original: rna ba dag tu rna cha 'dzin //
analyzed: rna ba dag tu rna cha 'dzin //
translated: one holds earrings in the ears.

original: rna cha'i phyag rgya ni 'od dpag med kyi rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rna cha'i phyag rgya ni 'od dpag med kyi rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The earring mudrƒÅ is the purity of AmitƒÅbha.

original: de yang 'du shes kyi phung po yin pas mngon par brjod pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: de yang 'du shes kyi phung po yin pas mngon par brjod pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: Moreover, since it is the aggregate of discrimination, it is the purity of verbal expression.

original: smod tshig mi nyan pa yin pas rna cha'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: smod tshig mi nyan pa yin pas rna cha'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Since one does not listen to disparaging words, one holds the earring mudrƒÅ.

original: sngags kyi bzlas pa mgul rgyan nyid //üîΩces pa ni /
analyzed: sngags kyi bzlas pa mgul rgyan nyid // ces pa ni /
translated: The recitation of mantra is the necklace.

original: mgrin pa nyid sgra yin la sgra'i lus ni sngags yin pas sngags kyi bzlas pa rnam par dag pa mgrin pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mgrin pa nyid sgra yin la sgra'i lus ni sngags yin pas sngags kyi bzlas pa rnam par dag pa mgrin pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The throat itself is sound, and the body of sound is mantra. Therefore, the pure recitation of mantra is the throat seal.

original: de rnam par dag pa ni tshor ba'i phung po'i bdag nyid rin @216b chen gtso bo yin no //üîΩgdu bu srog chags gsod pa spangs //
analyzed: de rnam par dag pa ni tshor ba'i phung po'i bdag nyid rin @216b chen gtso bo yin no // gdu bu srog chags gsod pa spangs //
translated: Its purity is the nature of the aggregate of feeling, which is Ratnasa·πÉbhava.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: The bracelet is the abandonment of killing.

original: lag pas srog chags gsod par byed pa yang lag gdub kyi phyag rgya btab pas srog gcod pa spangs pa'i rnam par dag pas gdu bu'i phyag rgya gzugs kyi phung po'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam par dag pa yin no //üîΩphyag rgya bsten pa ska rags nyid //
analyzed: lag pas srog chags gsod par byed pa yang lag gdub kyi phyag rgya btab pas srog gcod pa spangs pa'i rnam par dag pas gdu bu'i phyag rgya gzugs kyi phung po'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam par dag pa yin no // phyag rgya bsten pa ska rags nyid //
translated: The hand kills living beings. The seal of the bracelet is the purity of the abandonment of killing. Its purity is the nature of the aggregate of form, which is Vairocana.

original: ces pa ni /
analyzed: ces pa ni /
translated: The practice of the seal is the belt.

original: sked pa'i phyag rgya phyi rol gyi phyag rgya bsten pa spangs pa rnam par dag pa 'di yang nang gi phyag rgya bsten pa nyid rgyun mi 'chad par phyag rgya bsten pa'i rnam par dag pa ska rags te //
analyzed: sked pa'i phyag rgya phyi rol gyi phyag rgya bsten pa spangs pa rnam par dag pa 'di yang nang gi phyag rgya bsten pa nyid rgyun mi 'chad par phyag rgya bsten pa'i rnam par dag pa ska rags te //
translated: This girdle of the purity of the constant practice of the inner seal, which is the purity of the abandonment of the practice of the outer seal, is the purity of Amoghasiddhi.

original: 'du byed kyi phung po'i bdag nyid don yod grub pa rnam par dag par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po'i bdag nyid don yod grub pa rnam par dag par bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the teaching of the purity of Amoghasiddhi, whose nature is the aggregate of compositional factors.

original: bsdu ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: bsdu ba gsungs pa /
translated: The summary is stated:üîΩThe body should always be sealed

original: sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgya yis //üîΩlus ni rtag tu rgyas gdab po //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgya yis // lus ni rtag tu rgyas gdab po //
translated: with the seals of the five buddhas.

original: lus zhes pa ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: lus zhes pa ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The body is the nature of Hevajra.

original: rgyas gdab ces pa ni mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyas gdab ces pa ni mtshan pa'o //
translated: Sealed means marked.

original: rtag tu zhes pa ni rtag tu rgyun ma chad pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes pa ni rtag tu rgyun ma chad pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Always means constantly, without interruption.

original: gang gis she na phyag rgyas te mtshan mas so //
analyzed: gang gis she na phyag rgyas te mtshan mas so //
translated: By what? By the seals, that is, by the marks.

original: gang gis she na sangs rgyas lngas te /
analyzed: gang gis she na sangs rgyas lngas te /
translated: By what? By the five buddhas,

original: me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi yin no //
analyzed: me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi yin no //
translated: whose nature is the five pristine awarenesses, such as mirror-like pristine awareness.

original: 'dis ni he ru ka mngon par 'byung bar chos kyi gleng gzhi brgyad byed pa'i chos nyid chos yan lag dgu bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni he ru ka mngon par 'byung bar chos kyi gleng gzhi brgyad byed pa'i chos nyid chos yan lag dgu bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the teaching of the nine limbs of the Dharma, which is the subject matter of the eight topics of the Dharma in the Heruka Tantra.

original: sku gsum dang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyis na brten pa'i dkyil 'khor dang bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyir bdag med mas zhus pa'i sgo nas zhus pa'i lan gdab pa /
analyzed: sku gsum dang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyis na brten pa'i dkyil 'khor dang bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyir bdag med mas zhus pa'i sgo nas zhus pa'i lan gdab pa /
translated: The reply to the question of Nairatmya, which is the mandala of the supported and the mandala of the drawn, by means of the nature of the three bodies and the five pristine awarenesses,

original: de nas rab tu bzhad mdzad nas //
analyzed: de nas rab tu bzhad mdzad nas //
translated: Then, having laughed,

original: tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni //üîΩkye'i rdo rje lhan skyes rang bzhin can /
analyzed: tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni // kye'i rdo rje lhan skyes rang bzhin can /
translated: pressing the lower lip with the teeth,üîΩthe Bhagavat said to the goddess, Kye!

original: de la lha mo des zhus pa //
analyzed: de la lha mo des zhus pa //
translated: The goddess asked, What is the meaning of the laughter?üîΩThe Bhagavat replied, The laughter is the great laughter of the yoginis, the mantra ha ha ha ha ha ha.üîΩIt is the body of the five transcendent lords.üîΩThe Bhagavat said, The laughter is the great laughter of the yoginis, the mantra ha ha ha ha ha ha.üîΩIt is the body of the five transcendent lords.

original: rab tu bzhad ces pa ni ha ha ha ha ha ha zhes pa rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gad rgyangs chen po'i sngags te /
analyzed: rab tu bzhad ces pa ni ha ha ha ha ha ha zhes pa rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gad rgyangs chen po'i sngags te /
translated: The Bhagavat said, The laughter is the great laughter of the yoginis, the mantra ha ha ha ha ha ha.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams kyi skur byas pa'o //üîΩtshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams kyi skur byas pa'o // tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni //
translated: It is the body of the five transcendent lords.üîΩThe Bhagavat said, The laughter is the great laughter of the yoginis, the mantra ha ha ha ha ha ha.üîΩIt is the body of the five transcendent lords.üîΩThe Bhagavat said, The laughter is the great laughter of the yoginis, the mantra ha ha ha ha ha ha.üîΩIt is the body of the five transcendent lords.üîΩThe Bhagavat said, The laughter is the great laughter of the yoginis, the mantra ha ha ha ha ha ha.üîΩIt is the body of the five transcendent lords.üîΩThe Bhagavat said, The laughter is the great laughter of the yoginis, the mantra ha ha ha ha ha ha.üîΩIt is the body of the five transcendent lords.üîΩThe Bhagavat said, The laughter is the great laughter of the yoginis, the mantra ha ha ha ha ha ha.üîΩIt is the body of the five transcendent lords.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: The Bhagavat said, The laughter is the great laughter of the yoginis, the mantra ha ha ha ha ha ha

original: bcom ldan 'das sngar rjes su chags par mdzad nas phyis rab tu bzhad pa yin par dgongs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sngar rjes su chags par mdzad nas phyis rab tu bzhad pa yin par dgongs so //
translated: The Blessed One, thinking that he should first arouse her passion and then laugh,

original: lha mo des zhes pa ni spro ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: lha mo des zhes pa ni spro ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: the goddess is of the nature of enthusiasm.

original: kye rdo rje zhes pa ni gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: kye rdo rje zhes pa ni gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i sku'o //
translated: The Hevajra is the body of the inseparability of the two.

original: de nyid kyi phyir lhan skyes rang bzhin can ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir lhan skyes rang bzhin can ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: For that very reason, born together is of the nature of the perfect wisdom.

original: de ci yin pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ci yin pa gsungs pa /
translated: What is that? It is said:üîΩO chief, by what rite

original: gtso bo cho ga gang gis dang // de bzhin bya ba gang gis ni //
analyzed: gtso bo cho ga gang gis dang // de bzhin bya ba gang gis ni //
translated: and likewise by what action

original: @217a * // kye rdo rje yi bris sku yi //
analyzed: @217a * // kye rdo rje yi bris sku yi //
translated: is the painted image of HevajraüîΩto be made?

original: byed pa bde ba chen pos gsungs //
analyzed: byed pa bde ba chen pos gsungs //
translated: The great bliss said:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: 'dir ni 'dri mkhan dam tshig can //
analyzed: 'dir ni 'dri mkhan dam tshig can //
translated: Here, the painter should be one who has the commitments.

original: sgrub po'ang dam tshig can gyis ni //
analyzed: sgrub po'ang dam tshig can gyis ni //
translated: The practitioner also should be one who has the commitments.

original: bris sku 'jigs pa bri ba nyid //
analyzed: bris sku 'jigs pa bri ba nyid //
translated: He should paint the terrifying image.

original: skyes pa'i thod gnas tshon sna lnga //
analyzed: skyes pa'i thod gnas tshon sna lnga //
translated: The five colors should be in a human skull.

original: ro yi skra yi pir nyid kyis //
analyzed: ro yi skra yi pir nyid kyis //
translated: The brush should be made of human hair.

original: bris sku bla ma bri ba nyid //
analyzed: bris sku bla ma bri ba nyid //
translated: The image should be painted by the guru.

original: skyes pa'i thod par ni thod par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: skyes pa'i thod par ni thod par gnas pa'o //
translated: In the skull of a man, that is, in a skull.

original: tshon sna lnga ni bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pa'i tshon sna lngas so //
analyzed: tshon sna lnga ni bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pa'i tshon sna lngas so //
translated: With five colors, that is, with five colors mixed with the five nectars.

original: ro'i skra zhes pa ni spangs pa'i skra'i pir gyis so //
analyzed: ro'i skra zhes pa ni spangs pa'i skra'i pir gyis so //
translated: With the hair of a corpse, that is, with a brush made of cast-off hair.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i bri sku bri ba ni bdag med ma'i thang ka dang phya gnyis pa la sogs pa'i he ru ka'i ras ris dgyes pa'i rdo rje nyid dang kha sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i bri sku bri ba ni bdag med ma'i thang ka dang phya gnyis pa la sogs pa'i he ru ka'i ras ris dgyes pa'i rdo rje nyid dang kha sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The painting of Hevajra is the painting of Nairatmya, the painting of Heruka with two faces, etc. , because it is united with Hevajra himself.

original: he ru ka phyag gnyis pa'i yang dkyil 'khor pa'i mkha' 'gro ma ni phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor pa bzhin no //
analyzed: he ru ka phyag gnyis pa'i yang dkyil 'khor pa'i mkha' 'gro ma ni phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor pa bzhin no //
translated: The dakinis of the mandala of two-armed Heruka are like those of the mandala of sixteen-armed Heruka.

original: yang na bris sku bla ma zhes pa ni kun rdzob kyi bdag nyid kyi dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: yang na bris sku bla ma zhes pa ni kun rdzob kyi bdag nyid kyi dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: Or else, the painting of the guru is Hevajra of the nature of the relative.

original: bris sku 'jigs pa zhes pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid kyi dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: bris sku 'jigs pa zhes pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid kyi dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The painting of the terrible is Hevajra of the nature of the ultimate truth.

original: bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa nyid bden pa gnyis yin par bstan to //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa nyid bden pa gnyis yin par bstan to //
translated: The inseparability of the two truths is taught to be the two truths.

original: de bri ba nyid ni bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bri ba nyid ni bya ba'o //
translated: That drawing is the action.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: tshon sna lngas te me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: tshon sna lngas te me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes so //
translated: By the five colors, the mirror-like intuition, etc.

original: cir gyur pa zhe na skyes pa'i thod gnas te yi ge na dang dbyer med par sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: cir gyur pa zhe na skyes pa'i thod gnas te yi ge na dang dbyer med par sbyar ba'o //
translated: What is it? The skull of the born, i.e., the letter Na, inseparable from the union.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i ye shes der gnas pas de'i bdag nyid kyis de la thim pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i ye shes der gnas pas de'i bdag nyid kyis de la thim pa'o //
translated: The intuition that is such a place, by abiding there, dissolves into it, by its very nature.

original: ro'i skra zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi'o //
analyzed: ro'i skra zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi'o //
translated: The hair of the corpse is the intuition of the ultimate realm.

original: pir nyid kyis zhes pa ni thams cad nyid gcig pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i don to ;
analyzed: pir nyid kyis zhes pa ni thams cad nyid gcig pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i don to ;
translated: The brush itself means the nature of the oneness of all.üîΩWhoever spins the thread,

original: / gang gang skud pa 'khal ba dang // gang gang ras yug 'thag pa yang //
analyzed: / gang gang skud pa 'khal ba dang // gang gang ras yug 'thag pa yang //
translated: and whoever weaves the cloth,

original: de yang dam tshig can nges pas //
analyzed: de yang dam tshig can nges pas //
translated: that one, too, is a pledge-holder,

original: dam tshig byin brlabs rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: dam tshig byin brlabs rnal 'byor pas //
translated: the yogi consecrated by the pledge.

original: de yang dam tshig can zhes pa ni dam tshig ni lha 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de yang dam tshig can zhes pa ni dam tshig ni lha 'byung ba'o //
translated: The pledge is the arising of the deity.

original: de dang ldan pas te bdag med ma des so //
analyzed: de dang ldan pas te bdag med ma des so //
translated: The one who has that, i.e., Nairatmya, is the pledge-holder.

original: 'di ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: dam tshig byin brlabs rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: dam tshig byin brlabs rnal 'byor pas //
translated: The yogi, consecrated by the pledge,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This means:

original: lha thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa nyid do //
analyzed: lha thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa nyid do //
translated: all the deities are consecrated.

original: rnal 'byor pas ni de'i phyir kha sbyor ba yin pa'i don to //üîΩzla ba zla ba mar ngo yi //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas ni de'i phyir kha sbyor ba yin pa'i don to // zla ba zla ba mar ngo yi //
translated: The yogi, for that reason, is united.üîΩOn the fourteenth day of the waning moon,

original: bcu bzhi pa la khyim dben par //
analyzed: bcu bzhi pa la khyim dben par //
translated: in a solitary place,

original: nyin phyed ma rungs sems kyis ni //
analyzed: nyin phyed ma rungs sems kyis ni //
translated: at midday, with a wicked mind,

original: chang @217b gi btung ba cung zad las //
analyzed: chang @217b gi btung ba cung zad las //
translated: a little wine should be drunk.

original: lus la ni ram shu bsams nas //
analyzed: lus la ni ram shu bsams nas //
translated: Having contemplated the body as a skeleton,

original: de bzhin gcer bur gyur pa yang //
analyzed: de bzhin gcer bur gyur pa yang //
translated: and likewise as naked,

original: 'bags pa dang ni ma dag pas //
analyzed: 'bags pa dang ni ma dag pas //
translated: defiled and impure,

original: de nas dam tshig rab tu bza' //üîΩzla ba zla ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nas dam tshig rab tu bza' zhes pa'i mthar gsum po rnams kyi yang bya ba 'di yin te /
analyzed: de nas dam tshig rab tu bza' // zla ba zla ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nas dam tshig rab tu bza' zhes pa'i mthar gsum po rnams kyi yang bya ba 'di yin te /
translated: then the pledge should be well eaten.

original: ri mo mkhan dang sgrub pa po dang skud pa 'khal nas ras 'thag pa don gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: ri mo mkhan dang sgrub pa po dang skud pa 'khal nas ras 'thag pa don gsal ba nyid do //
translated: On the fourteenth day of the waning moon, etc., up to then the pledge should be well eaten. This is the duty of the three: the painter, the practitioner, and the weaver who has spun the thread. The meaning is clear.

original: yang na zla ba zla ba zhes pa ni bgrang ba las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: yang na zla ba zla ba zhes pa ni bgrang ba las 'das pa'o //
translated: Or, the fourteenth day of the waning moon means beyond counting.

original: 'di nyid ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di nyid ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: How is this?

original: mar ngo zhes pa ni bdag med ma bden pa'o //
analyzed: mar ngo zhes pa ni bdag med ma bden pa'o //
translated: The dark fortnight is the reality of Nairatmya.

original: bcu bzhi zhes pa ni mkha' 'gro ma bcu bzhi dang ldan pa las so //
analyzed: bcu bzhi zhes pa ni mkha' 'gro ma bcu bzhi dang ldan pa las so //
translated: The fourteenth is the union with the fourteen dakinis.

original: khyim dben par ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin chos 'byung gi gzhal yas khang ngo //
analyzed: khyim dben par ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin chos 'byung gi gzhal yas khang ngo //
translated: In a solitary place is the celestial mansion of the Dharma realm, the source of phenomena.

original: cis khyad 'phags she na /
analyzed: cis khyad 'phags she na /
translated: How is it distinguished?

original: nyin phyed ni gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: nyin phyed ni gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid do //
translated: At noon is the nature of Hevajra, in the manner of nonduality.üîΩHow is this?

original: 'di ji ltar yin pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di ji ltar yin pa gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: cung zad sems pa yin pas sems so //
analyzed: cung zad sems pa yin pas sems so //
translated: The mind is slightly thought, therefore it is mind.

original: de cis khyad 'phags she na /
analyzed: de cis khyad 'phags she na /
translated: How is it distinguished?

original: cung zad ste cung zad ces pa ni spyod yul gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cung zad ste cung zad ces pa ni spyod yul gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Slightly is slightly, because it is not the nature of the domain.üîΩHow is that?

original: de nyid ji ltar yin zhe na chang gi btung ba las te /
analyzed: de nyid ji ltar yin zhe na chang gi btung ba las te /
translated: From the drinking of beer,

original: sems kyi mngon par zhen pa log pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi mngon par zhen pa log pa'o //
translated: the mind turns away from attachment.

original: aam shu ni mkha' spyod tshun chad kyi byang chub po ;
analyzed: aam shu ni mkha' spyod tshun chad kyi byang chub po ;
translated: Am shu is the enlightenment up to the sky-farers.

original: / ni ram shu ni zla ba'o //
analyzed: / ni ram shu ni zla ba'o //
translated: Nam shu is the moon.

original: can ni bde ba'o //
analyzed: can ni bde ba'o //
translated: The one is bliss.

original: bsams nas ni bltas te /
analyzed: bsams nas ni bltas te /
translated: Having thought this, he should look.

original: 'di tshun chad sems kyi spyod yul nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di tshun chad sems kyi spyod yul nyid yin no //
translated: From here on, it is the domain of the mind.

original: de bzhin gcer bur gyur pa yang //
analyzed: de bzhin gcer bur gyur pa yang //
translated: Likewise, naked,

original: zhes pa ni sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid du gyur pa bden pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid du gyur pa bden pa'o //
translated: this is the truth of the nature of non-obstruction.üîΩLikewise, also,

original: de bzhin yang zhes pa ni bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin yang zhes pa ni bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: this fourth [stage] is taught to be just like that.

original: 'bags pa dang ni ma dag pa //
analyzed: 'bags pa dang ni ma dag pa //
translated: Stained and impure,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: this is

original: gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i rgyus so //
analyzed: gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i rgyus so //
translated: the cause of freedom from the conceptualization of pure and impure, etc.

original: dam tshig ni lha thams cad 'byung ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dam tshig ni lha thams cad 'byung ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The pledge is the nature of the arising of all deities.

original: rab tu bza' ni rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin skyed pa yin pa'i don to ;
analyzed: rab tu bza' ni rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin skyed pa yin pa'i don to ;
translated: To eat well is the meaning of generating the nature of essencelessness.üîΩThe beautiful, the kind-hearted,

original: / bzhin bzangs snying dang ldan pa dang // gzugs dang lang tsho skal bzang ma //
analyzed: / bzhin bzangs snying dang ldan pa dang // gzugs dang lang tsho skal bzang ma //
translated: the fortunate with form and youth,

original: me tog bcas shing sgrub por dga' //
analyzed: me tog bcas shing sgrub por dga' //
translated: with flowers, and delighting in practice,

original: gnyug ma'i phyag rgya g-yon du gzhag //
analyzed: gnyug ma'i phyag rgya g-yon du gzhag //
translated: the innate consort placed on the left,

original: ri mo mkhan gyi bri ba'i dam tshig ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du don 'di yang bstan to //
analyzed: ri mo mkhan gyi bri ba'i dam tshig ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du don 'di yang bstan to //
translated: Just as the artist paints, so this meaning is taught.

original: yang na gnyug ma'i @218a * //üîΩphyag rgya ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: yang na gnyug ma'i @218a * // phyag rgya ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Or, the innate mudra is the innate gnosis.

original: gzhag pa ni g-yo ba med pa nges pa'o //
analyzed: gzhag pa ni g-yo ba med pa nges pa'o //
translated: The placement is the ascertainment of the unmoving.

original: gang zhig ce na /
analyzed: gang zhig ce na /
translated: What is it?

original: g-yon pas te zla bas so //
analyzed: g-yon pas te zla bas so //
translated: The left, that is, the moon.

original: cir gyur pa zhe na bzhin bzangs te /
analyzed: cir gyur pa zhe na bzhin bzangs te /
translated: What is it like?

original: gnyi ga'i n'a dang phreng gnyis dbyer med pa aam dkyil 'khor gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i n'a dang phreng gnyis dbyer med pa aam dkyil 'khor gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The beautiful one, that is, the two garlands of the two mandalas of A and A inseparable, the nature of the gnosis of the inseparability of the two mandalas.

original: snying rje ldan pa dang zhes pa ni 'gro ba'i don byed par nus pa 'du shes kyi phung po'i rang bzhin 'od dpag tu med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: snying rje ldan pa dang zhes pa ni 'gro ba'i don byed par nus pa 'du shes kyi phung po'i rang bzhin 'od dpag tu med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: Compassionate, that is, able to benefit migrating beings, the nature of the aggregate of discernment, the essence of the gnosis of AmitƒÅbha.

original: gzugs dang lang tsho skal bzang ma //
analyzed: gzugs dang lang tsho skal bzang ma //
translated: Beautiful form, youth, and good fortune

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: means

original: sku gsum gyi rang bzhin aam sngar bstan pa'i don gyi don to //
analyzed: sku gsum gyi rang bzhin aam sngar bstan pa'i don gyi don to //
translated: the nature of the three kƒÅyas, the meaning of the previously explained A.

original: me tog bzang po zhes pa ni bzang po khu ba'o //
analyzed: me tog bzang po zhes pa ni bzang po khu ba'o //
translated: Good flowers means good semen.

original: me tog ni khrag go //
analyzed: me tog ni khrag go //
translated: The flower is blood.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma dbyer med pa'i aam de bzhin nyid kyi don to //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma dbyer med pa'i aam de bzhin nyid kyi don to //
translated: The A which is the indivisibility of the moon and sun is the meaning of thusness.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sgrub por dga' ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dbyer med pa nyid kyi kha sbyor gyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sgrub por dga' ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dbyer med pa nyid kyi kha sbyor gyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the one who is delighted in the practice is the nature of the union which is the indivisibility of Vajradhara.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dra ba las ras ris kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste drug pa'o //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dra ba las ras ris kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste drug pa'o //
translated: This is the sixth chapter on the procedure of the painting of Hevajra and the yoginis' net.

original: rab tu gsal ba'i kha sbyor gyi rgya cher 'grel pa las dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i ras ris kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba le'u drug pa'o /
analyzed: rab tu gsal ba'i kha sbyor gyi rgya cher 'grel pa las dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i ras ris kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba le'u drug pa'o /
translated: This concludes the sixth chapter on the procedure of the painting of Hevajra in the Commentary on the Difficult Points of the Shri Herukabhidhana Tantra, called Illuminating the Path to Freedom.

original: // / de nas de la lha mos zhus //üîΩbo la kakko la sbyar nas //
analyzed: // / de nas de la lha mos zhus // bo la kakko la sbyar nas //
translated: Then the goddess asked him,üîΩHaving united the bola and kakkola,

original: tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni //
analyzed: tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni //
translated: and having bitten the lower lip with your teeth,

original: glegs bam yang ni ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: glegs bam yang ni ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: how will the book come to be?

original: da ni dkyil 'khor gsum gyi rang bzhin rtogs par byas nas brten pa'i dkyil 'khor yang rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor dang bris pa'i dkyil 'khor ras ris kyi cho ga sngon du 'gro ba rtogs par byas te rdo rje rigs kyi rim par phye bar gsungs pa'i sku
analyzed: da ni dkyil 'khor gsum gyi rang bzhin rtogs par byas nas brten pa'i dkyil 'khor yang rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor dang bris pa'i dkyil 'khor ras ris kyi cho ga sngon du 'gro ba rtogs par byas te rdo rje rigs kyi rim par phye bar gsungs pa'i sku
translated: Now, having realized the nature of the three mandalas, one should realize the supported mandala, the mandala of colored powder and the mandala of drawing, preceded by the ritual of the cloth, and the bodyüîΩvajra taught in the section on the vajra family, the nature of the emanation body.

original: rdo rje'i rang bzhin sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par bya ba dang / sngags kyi rim par phye bar bstan pa'i gsung rdo rje'i rang bzhin longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
analyzed: rdo rje'i rang bzhin sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par bya ba dang / sngags kyi rim par phye bar bstan pa'i gsung rdo rje'i rang bzhin longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
translated: The speech vajra taught in the section on mantra is the nature of the enjoyment body,

original: sprul pa'i sku dang dbyer med pa'i //
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku dang dbyer med pa'i //
translated: inseparable from the emanation body.

original: glegs bam yang ni ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: glegs bam yang ni ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: How is there also a book?

original: zhes zhus pa'i sgo nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes zhus pa'i sgo nas gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said by way of request.

original: de nyid bstan pa ;
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa ;
translated: The teaching of that:

original: / rdo rje padma mnyam sbyar nas //
analyzed: / rdo rje padma mnyam sbyar nas //

original: bden pa gnyi ga'i bdag nyid chos kyi sku bstan par bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor mas zhus pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa /
analyzed: bden pa gnyi ga'i bdag nyid chos kyi sku bstan par bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor mas zhus pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa /
translated: Now, having taught the two truths, which are the nature of the two bodies, through the rites of the painted image and the book, in order to teach the truth body, which is the nature of the two truths, the request of the yoginis is entered into.üîΩThe request of the yoginis

original: de nas rnal 'byor mas zhus pa //
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor mas zhus pa //
translated: Then the yoginis asked:

original: phyag rgya chen po ji lta bu //üîΩkun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po ji lta bu // kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
translated: What is the great seal?

original: bde ba sbyin pa bshad du gsol //
analyzed: bde ba sbyin pa bshad du gsol //
translated: Please explain the bestowal of blissüîΩthrough the form of the relative.

original: phyag rgya chen po kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ji lta bu yin par bde ba ster bas bdag la bshad du gsol ba'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ji lta bu yin par bde ba ster bas bdag la bshad du gsol ba'o //
translated: What is the great seal, which is the bestowal of bliss through the form of the relative? Please explain this to me.

original: rnal 'byor ma ni bdag med ma la sogs pas zhus pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni bdag med ma la sogs pas zhus pa'o //
translated: The yoginis are Nairatmya and so forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: shin tu ring min thung ba min //
analyzed: shin tu ring min thung ba min //
translated: Not too long, not short,

original: gnag pa ma yin dkar ba min //
analyzed: gnag pa ma yin dkar ba min //
translated: not dark, not fair,

original: padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam par 'dra //
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam par 'dra //
translated: like the petals of a lotus.üîΩHer breath is fragrant, like the petals of a lotus.

original: de yid dbugs ni dri zhim ldang // padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa 'dra ni mchog tu 'dod pa gang sgrol ma'i rang bzhin te bzhi pa'i rnal 'byor ma bstan to //
analyzed: de yid dbugs ni dri zhim ldang // padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa 'dra ni mchog tu 'dod pa gang sgrol ma'i rang bzhin te bzhi pa'i rnal 'byor ma bstan to //
translated: The like the petals of a lotus is the supreme desire, which is the nature of Tara, taught as the fourth yogini.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de'i dbugs ni n'a da phreng gnyis dang dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de'i dbugs ni n'a da phreng gnyis dang dbyer med pa'o //

original: dri zhim ldang ni mdzes pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i ye shes gnyi ga dbyer med pa nyid yin par dgongs so /
analyzed: dri zhim ldang ni mdzes pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i ye shes gnyi ga dbyer med pa nyid yin par dgongs so /
translated: The fragrant is the intention that the two wisdoms, which have the beauty of wisdom, are inseparable.

original: rdul yang dri zhim ldan gyur te //
analyzed: rdul yang dri zhim ldan gyur te //
translated: Her dust is fragrant,

original: ri dags lte ba'i dri dang mtshungs //
analyzed: ri dags lte ba'i dri dang mtshungs //
translated: like the smell of a deer's navel.

original: de rnams kyi rdul ni gla rtsi'i dri dang mtshungs so ;
analyzed: de rnams kyi rdul ni gla rtsi'i dri dang mtshungs so ;

original: /'dis ni rin chen gtso rnam par dag pa 'di rnams bstan to //
analyzed: /'dis ni rin chen gtso rnam par dag pa 'di rnams bstan to //
translated: This teaches the purity of the chief jewels.

original: padma la yang autpala dri //
analyzed: padma la yang autpala dri //
translated: The lotus also has the smell of utpala.

original: skad cig padma lta bur 'byung //
analyzed: skad cig padma lta bur 'byung //

original: padma zhes pa ni chos 'byung ngo //
analyzed: padma zhes pa ni chos 'byung ngo //

original: de yang autpala ni autpala dang 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: de yang autpala ni autpala dang 'dra ba ste /

original: shin tu gzhon pa yin par bstan to //
analyzed: shin tu gzhon pa yin par bstan to //
translated: indicating that it is very young.

original: dri zhes pa ni padma de nyid kyi dri yang padma dang 'dra bar padma'i dri'o //
analyzed: dri zhes pa ni padma de nyid kyi dri yang padma dang 'dra bar padma'i dri'o //
translated: The fragrance is the fragrance of that lotus, like the fragrance of a lotus.

original: de 'byung ba ni shes pa las so //
analyzed: de 'byung ba ni shes pa las so //
translated: It arises from consciousness.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: skad cig gi ye shes las te mnyam par sbyor ba'i skad cig las yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: skad cig gi ye shes las te mnyam par sbyor ba'i skad cig las yin pa'i don to //
translated: From the instant of gnosis, from the instant of union.

original: 'dis ni 'di rnams 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnam par dag pa bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di rnams 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnam par dag pa bstan to //
translated: This shows their purity as Amitabha.üîΩThe wise one should indicate the fragrance

original: de yi ga pur si hla dag / mkhas pas @220b dri bzang mtshon par bya //
analyzed: de yi ga pur si hla dag / mkhas pas @220b dri bzang mtshon par bya //
translated: with camphor and spikenard.

original: autpala yi drir 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: autpala yi drir 'gyur zhing //
translated: It becomes the fragrance of the utpala,

original: aa ga ru ni nag po mtshungs //
analyzed: aa ga ru ni nag po mtshungs //
translated: and is equal to black agarwood.

original: autpala'i dri dang ga pur dang si hla dang aa ga ru nag po dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: autpala'i dri dang ga pur dang si hla dang aa ga ru nag po dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: It is equal to the fragrance of the utpala, camphor, spikenard, and black agarwood.

original: shin tu ring min thung ba min //
analyzed: shin tu ring min thung ba min //
translated: Not too long, not short,

original: gnag pa ma yin dkar ba min //
analyzed: gnag pa ma yin dkar ba min //
translated: not dark, not light,

original: zhes pa 'dis ni kun du snang ba'i mtshan nyid sprul pa'i sku bstan to //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis ni kun du snang ba'i mtshan nyid sprul pa'i sku bstan to //
translated: This shows the emanation body, which has the characteristic of universal appearance.

original: padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa 'dra //
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa 'dra //
translated: It is like the form of a lotus petal.üîΩIts breath has a sweet fragrance.

original: de yi dbugs ni dri zhim ldang // zhes pa 'dis ni mngon par brjod pa'i mtshan nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: de yi dbugs ni dri zhim ldang // zhes pa 'dis ni mngon par brjod pa'i mtshan nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: This shows the enjoyment body, which has the characteristic of expression.

original: rdul yang dri zhim ldan 'gyur te //
analyzed: rdul yang dri zhim ldan 'gyur te //
translated: Even the dust has a sweet fragrance,

original: ri dags lte ba'i dri dang mtshungs //
analyzed: ri dags lte ba'i dri dang mtshungs //
translated: like the fragrance of a deer's navel.

original: zhes pa 'di ni rig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku bstan to //
analyzed: zhes pa 'di ni rig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku bstan to //
translated: This shows the nature body, which has the characteristic of knowledge.

original: padma la yang autpala dri //
analyzed: padma la yang autpala dri //
translated: The lotus also has the fragrance of the utpala.

original: skad cig padma lta bur 'byung //
analyzed: skad cig padma lta bur 'byung //
translated: It arises in an instant, like a lotus.

original: zhes pa 'dis ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin gyi bzhi pa bstan to //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin gyi bzhi pa bstan to //
translated: This shows the fourth body, the essence body, which has the nature of the indivisibility of the three vajras.

original: de yi ga pur si hla dag / mkhas pas dri bzang mtshon par bya //
analyzed: de yi ga pur si hla dag / mkhas pas dri bzang mtshon par bya //
translated: The wise one should indicate the sweet fragrance with camphor and spikenard.

original: sku bzhi po 'di nyid dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin kha sbyar ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: sku bzhi po 'di nyid dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin kha sbyar ba nyid yin no //

original: ga pur dang si hla dag ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med ma dag go //
analyzed: ga pur dang si hla dag ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med ma dag go //
translated: Camphor and costus are Vajradhara and NairƒÅtmya.

original: dri bzang ni mdzes pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: dri bzang ni mdzes pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Good scent is beautiful intuition.

original: mtshon par bya ba ni shes pa'o //
analyzed: mtshon par bya ba ni shes pa'o //

analyzed: mkhas pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin pa'i don to //
translated: The wise one is the intuition of perfect buddhahood.üîΩSlow, not fickle, not cheating,

original: dal zhing mi g-yo ma nyid dang // snyan par smra zhing yid 'ong ma //
analyzed: dal zhing mi g-yo ma nyid dang // snyan par smra zhing yid 'ong ma //

original: skra bzang dbus su gnyer ma gsum //
analyzed: skra bzang dbus su gnyer ma gsum //

original: phal pas padma can du brjod //
analyzed: phal pas padma can du brjod //
translated: is called the lotus woman by the common people.

original: dal ba zhes pa ni mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: dal ba zhes pa ni mkhas pa'o //

analyzed: mi g-yo ma zhes pa ni khyo ga gzhan la mi 'gro ba'o //

original: yid 'ong ma zhes pa ni yid bde ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yid 'ong ma zhes pa ni yid bde ba la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: skra bzang shes pa ni 'jam zhing mnyen pa dri zhim po dang mtshungs par dbus su 'ong ba'i skra dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: dbus su gnyer ma gsum ni lang tsho gzhon nu ma dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: de nyid phal pas ni sems can gyis te 'dod pa'i chags pa dbang du byed pa rnams kyis so //

original: padma can ni mchog gi gtso mo yin par bstan to //
analyzed: padma can ni mchog gi gtso mo yin par bstan to //

analyzed: yang na sngar bstan pa'i ga pur dang si hla dag gi dri zhim po des kha sbyar bas so //
translated: Or else, by the union of the two, camphor and musk, which were taught previously.

analyzed: dal zhing ni stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin no //

original: de nyid kyi phyir mi @221a * //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mi @221a * //
translated: For that very reason, she is
