analyzed: snyan par smra zhing ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no //
translated: She speaks pleasantly, having the nature of the enjoyment body.

original: yid 'ong ma zhes pa ni chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin bdag nyid do //
analyzed: yid 'ong ma zhes pa ni chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin bdag nyid do //
translated: She is called ‚Äúlovely,‚Äù having the nature of the reality body.

analyzed: skra bzang ni sku gsum dbyer med pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no //
translated: She has beautiful hair, having the nature of the body of the indivisibility of the three bodies.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dbus su gnyer ma gsum zhes pa ni sku thams cad kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dbus su gnyer ma gsum zhes pa ni sku thams cad kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa'o //

original: de phal bas ni de kho na nyid dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: de phal bas ni de kho na nyid dang ldan pas so //

original: padma can zhes pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes can no //
analyzed: padma can zhes pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes can no //
translated: ‚ÄúPadminƒ´‚Äù means one who has the gnosis of perfect complete enlightenment.

original: brjod ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: brjod ni nges pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSaid‚Äù means ascertained.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can ma ;
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can ma ;
translated: ‚ÄúBorn together‚Äù means the form of the innate.

original: / de rnyed nas ni dngos grub 'gyur //
analyzed: / de rnyed nas ni dngos grub 'gyur //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving attained that, there is success.‚Äù

original: zhes pa la dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa'o //
translated: Here, ‚Äúsuccess‚Äù means attaining the success of the great seal.

original: de ni padma can no //
analyzed: de ni padma can no //
translated: That is the padminƒ´.

original: rnyed nas ni shes nas so //
analyzed: rnyed nas ni shes nas so //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving attained‚Äù means having known.

original: 'di ji ltar yin zhe na gang gi phyir de lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can ma'o //
analyzed: 'di ji ltar yin zhe na gang gi phyir de lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can ma'o //
translated: How is this? Because she is the one who is born together with the form of the innate.

original: yang na dngos grub ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: yang na dngos grub ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: Or, what kind of success is there?

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes nyid dngos grub yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes nyid dngos grub yin pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the innate gnosis itself is the success.

original: de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med mas gsol ba //
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med mas gsol ba //
translated: Then the yoginƒ´ NairƒÅtmyƒÅ requested:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ‚ÄúBhagavƒÅn,

original: ji ltar smon lam gdab par bgyi //üîΩ'di'i don ni 'di yin te 'di 'dra ba'i phyag rgya chen po kun rdzob kyi rnam pa'i gzugs can ma de yang thun mong ma yin pa 'di lta bu'i mtshan nyid rnams kyang smon lam gyi stobs las yang dag par 'byung ba der smon lam ji lta bu
analyzed: ji ltar smon lam gdab par bgyi // 'di'i don ni 'di yin te 'di 'dra ba'i phyag rgya chen po kun rdzob kyi rnam pa'i gzugs can ma de yang thun mong ma yin pa 'di lta bu'i mtshan nyid rnams kyang smon lam gyi stobs las yang dag par 'byung ba der smon lam ji lta bu
translated: How should one make a prayer?üîΩThe meaning of this is as follows: That such a great seal, having the form of a relative aspect, also has such uncommon characteristics, which arise from the power of prayer.

analyzed: btab pas 'di lta bu'i phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin yin par dgongs zhes de nyid la zhus pa'o //
translated: What kind of prayer is made so that it has the nature of such a great seal?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn replied:

analyzed: rigs su skye dang dam tshig can //
translated: Born into a family, having a pledge,

original: smyo med kye yi rdo rje ston //
analyzed: smyo med kye yi rdo rje ston //
translated: not insane, teaching Hevajra,

original: bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan //
analyzed: bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan //
translated: respectful to the guru, compassionate,üîΩmay I be so in lifetime after lifetime.

analyzed: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog / lag pa rdo rje dril bu 'khrol //

analyzed: zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang // btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can //
translated: reading the profound Dharma, eating the food of queen‚Äôs semen,

analyzed: skye ba skye bar 'gyur bar shog / rigs zhes pa ni mchog de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'o //

original: skye ba ni skye ba'o //
analyzed: skye ba ni skye ba'o //
translated: Birth is the birth.

original: smyo med ces pa ni bag yod pa'o //
analyzed: smyo med ces pa ni bag yod pa'o //

analyzed: rigs su skye ba ni thams cad yongs su spangs pa'o //

analyzed: kye'i rdo rje @221b ston zhes pa ni bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas pa'o //

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /

original: bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan //
analyzed: bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan //

analyzed: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog / ces pa ni //

original: lag pa rdo rje dril bu 'khrol //
analyzed: lag pa rdo rje dril bu 'khrol //
translated: With vajra and bell in hand,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: means

original: 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
analyzed: 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
translated: this is merely an illustration.

original: de kho na nyid shes par gyur cig pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid shes par gyur cig pa'o //
translated: May I come to know reality.üîΩReading the profound Dharma,

original: zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang // zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang // zhes pa ni /
translated: means

original: theg pa chen po gsang sngags ston pa la mngon par dga' ba'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po gsang sngags ston pa la mngon par dga' ba'o //
translated: He is one who delights in teaching the secret mantra of the Great Vehicle.

analyzed: btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can // zhes pa ni /
translated: He is one who eats the semen of the queen.

analyzed: rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa'i lus yin ba'i don to /

analyzed: zab mo'i chos ni 'don pa dang nyid kyis ni smyo med kye'o rdo rje ston to //

analyzed: btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can nyid kyis ni /

original: bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan //

original: ces pa ni /
analyzed: ces pa ni /

analyzed: rim pa 'dis kha sbyor 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rang bzhin ni rtog pa thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid ni 'dus byas kyi khams su mi gnas
translated: By this process, the characteristic of the separation of the union is the nature of non-duality itself, the emanation and gathering of which is the abandonment of all conceptual thoughts. This very BhagavƒÅn does not abide in the compounded realm,

original: ji ltar zhe na ma phugs pas te /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na ma phugs pas te /

original: bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i ye shes khongs su chud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i ye shes khongs su chud pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: dga' ba skyed par byed pa ni phul du byung ba'i bde ba'i ye shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yang de la med par dgongs so //

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa tsam gyi dpe slar yang bshad pa ni /
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa tsam gyi dpe slar yang bshad pa ni /

original: gang gi lha mo rin chen che //
analyzed: gang gi lha mo rin chen che //
translated: The one whose goddess is a great gem,

original: 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i sku //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i sku //

analyzed: de / ma phugs pas ni sbyor bral 'gyur //

original: yang phugs pas dga' ba skyed par byed de /
analyzed: yang phugs pas dga' ba skyed par byed de /

original: don gsungs pa /
analyzed: don gsungs pa /

analyzed: de ltar ni de bzhin du'o //

original: 'khor ba ni 'khor ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: 'khor ba ni 'khor ba'i ye shes so //

original: rin chen ni dga' ba rgyas par byed pas na rin chen no //
analyzed: rin chen ni dga' ba rgyas par byed pas na rin chen no //

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pas so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pas so //

original: de yang 'khor ba ma dag pas dug tu 'gyur bar 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de yang 'khor ba ma dag pas dug tu 'gyur bar 'byung ngo //

analyzed: dag na bdud rtsi dang 'dra bar bdud rtsi bzhin du 'gyur ro //

original: rin chen ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rin chen ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no //

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag na bdud rtsi lta bur byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro //

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: 'khor ba'i rnam pa ni ma ning ngo //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rnam pa ni ma ning ngo //
translated: the aspect of cyclic life is neuter.

original: he ru ka 'gro ba sgrol ba ni sku gsum dang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: he ru ka 'gro ba sgrol ba ni sku gsum dang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //

analyzed: gtso bo zhes pa ni bdag nyid byed par gyur pa la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur ba'i phyir ro //

original: gang gi gzugs kyis ni gang gi rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: gang gi gzugs kyis ni gang gi rang bzhin gyis so //

original: de ni nga yis te yi ge aa dang ham gi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni nga yis te yi ge aa dang ham gi rang bzhin no //
translated: That is mine, which is the nature of the letters A and HAM.

original: smra yis ni smra ba'o //
analyzed: smra yis ni smra ba'o //

original: snying rje'i spyan ni dmar po la //
analyzed: snying rje'i spyan ni dmar po la //
translated: The eyes are red with compassion,

original: byams @225a * //üîΩpa'i thugs la yan lag gnag / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni //
analyzed: byams @225a * // pa'i thugs la yan lag gnag / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni //
